title: AI Future City - Cinematic Background Music
description: Epic cinematic orchestral music with electronic elements for a futuristic AI robot city video

audio_concept.music_style: Epic cinematic orchestral with electronic elements
key_moments: Gentle tech sounds for robot introduction (6-12s)

generation_request.prompt: Epic cinematic orchestral music with electronic elements for a futuristic AI robot city video. The music should be inspiring, professional, and futuristic, featuring dramatic orchestral intro, gentle tech sounds, building energy, rhythmic changes, and an epic crescendo finale. Perfect for a 30-second cinematic video showcasing AI robots seamlessly integrating with human society in a stunning future cityscape.

video_alignment.scene_1: Dramatic orchestral intro for urban skyline reveal (0-6s)
video_alignment.scene_2: Gentle tech sounds for AI robot introduction (6-12s)
video_alignment.scene_4: Quick rhythmic changes for future vision montage (20-26s)
video_alignment.scene_5: Epic crescendo for city pulse finale (26-30s)

note: Music specification created based on video concept. Ready for audio generation using t2m-google-lyria service when permissions are available.
